title: Virginia "Ginni" Thomas, Justice Clarence Thomas' wife, exchanged texts with Mark Meadows about efforts to overturn the 2020 election - CBS News
content:
1. Virginia "Ginni" Thomas, Justice Clarence Thomas' wife, exchanged texts with Mark Meadows about efforts to overturn the 2020 election  CBS News
  2. First on CNN: January 6 committee has text messages between Ginni Thomas and Mark Meadows  CNN
  3. Supreme Court justice Thomas's wife urged Trump White House to overturn 2020 election -report  Reuters.com
  4. Ginni Thomas and Mark Meadows texted about efforts to overturn 2020 election  CBS News
  5. Wife of Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas texted Trump chief about overturning 2020 election  CNBC
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: CBS News and The Washington Post have obtained copies of numerous text messages exchanged between Thomas and Trump's White House chief of staff.
